title: When will they send the CNR or MRD scholarship for 6th-semester students? It's been a month since the scholarships were announced. Has anyone received it?

comments.body: Expect it by the end of this semester

you've been here for five full semesters and you still didn't figure out the answer?

they'll send it whenever the fuck they want
mail that said Congratulations for securing the  X Scholarship
how many weeks after esa result did you receive the mail?
what is the amount u guys are getting? , if u guys are thru cet ?
don't know exactly but this is my first time
